description:
(:-) Loving your Music Radar on my Linux (Lubuntu 20) desktop pc, thank you very much. It works! +recognises several test tracks so far (using "microphone" option.
-unlike some other recog software / websites I've tried.
3rdRockGuy

There is no perfect music-recognition software as far as I know. Specifically this one has a very clean and simple design. No unnecessary buttons or functions. No ads! It requires very low amount of power to works.
summary: It's not perfect, but it's good enough!

description: Very usefull when I am stuck with a music played in a movie
Clean, quick, simple. Could only be improved by a continuous listening mode.
On FIrefox AHA music finder is not available, so I needed an alternative. I found an add on "Identify", but it sucks big time. But this MusicRadar, this founded every song I asked it to do. 10+++
bah nul si sa fonctionne pas...

Сonvenient application for searching music by a recorded fragment. 
The best part is that you can search for music without turning on the speakers - the program will record the fragment itself.
summary: Сonvenient application for searching music by a recorded fragment
